name: Quacked Circuit
description:
First 'proper' game ever created. All done in Game Maker Studio and GIMP

Help out your buddy to boot his broken computer in his workshop by sending processes to the right components in the motherboard of a computer.

Credits to my friends: Conor, Jakub and David Conway

Link to original submission: https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/quacked-circuit
